meals.name: Shakshuka
meals.prepInstructions: Option A (Stove): Heat marinara in small pan, crack eggs on top, cover and cook 5-6 min until whites set. Top with feta. Option B (Microwave): Pour marinara in bowl, crack eggs on top, cover loosely with plate. Microwave 2 min, check, then 30-sec intervals until whites set. Top with feta. Steam spinach separately (2 min).

meals.name: Apple + Almond Butter
meals.prepInstructions: Slice apple, dip in or spread almond butter.

meals.name: Ground Beef & Brussels Sprouts
meals.prepInstructions: Oven Option (25 min): Preheat oven to 400째F (200째C). Toss halved Brussels with EVOO, salt, pepper, garlic powder. Roast on baking sheet 20-25 min until crispy. Reheat beef in microwave last 2 min. Microwave Option: Steam Brussels in microwave with extra water (5-6 min), optionally pan-sear briefly in skillet with EVOO to add flavor. Reheat beef, combine.

meals.name: Bone broth
meals.prepInstructions: Heat bone broth in microwave.

days.batchCookingNotes: Make Ground Beef Chili (large batch): Brown 680-900g ground beef, add 1 can diced tomatoes, 1/2 can kidney beans, spices (2 tbsp chili powder, 1 tbsp cumin, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp paprika). Simmer 20-30 min. Makes 4-5 servings. Also bake Salmon & Asparagus for dinner.

meals.name: Ground Beef Chili (High Protein)
ingredients: Top with 2 tbsp (30g) Greek yogurt or Trimona yogurt
meals.prepInstructions: See batch cooking section. Make large batch today. Serve bowl with yogurt dollop on top.

meals.name: Cottage Cheese Bowl
meals.prepInstructions: Scoop cottage cheese, top with berries and cinnamon.

meals.name: Salmon & Asparagus
meals.prepInstructions: Oven Option (20 min): Preheat oven to 400째F (200째C). Place salmon and asparagus on baking sheet. Dot salmon with butter, season with salt, pepper, dill. Drizzle asparagus with EVOO, salt, pepper. Bake 12-15 min (salmon should flake easily). Squeeze lemon over everything. Microwave Option: Place salmon in dish, season with butter, dill, lemon. Cover with vented lid, microwave 3-4 min (check at 3 min). Steam asparagus separately (3-4 min).

meals.name: Herbal tea
meals.prepInstructions: Brew herbal tea.

meals.name: Leftover Beef Chili
ingredients: Top with 2 tbsp (30g) Greek yogurt or Trimona yogurt
meals.prepInstructions: Microwave chili until hot. Top with yogurt.

meals.name: Chia Pudding
meals.prepInstructions: Eat cold from fridge. Top with cinnamon if you didn't add it before.

meals.name: Egg & Veggie Plate
meals.prepInstructions: Steam asparagus in microwave with extra water (3-4 min). For eggs - Microwave: Scramble in bowl, cook 1 min, stir, 30-sec intervals OR Stove: Fry or scramble in pan with butter. Slice avocado, serve alongside.

meals.name: Bone broth
meals.prepInstructions: Heat bone broth in microwave.

days.reminder: Pick up rotisserie chicken from Whole Foods today (on sale)!

meals.name: Tuna & Edamame Bowl
meals.prepInstructions: Cook frozen edamame: Microwave in shell (5 min), then shell them OR buy pre-shelled and steam (3 min). Arrange greens in bowl, top with drained tuna, edamame, cucumber. Drizzle EVOO + lemon juice.

meals.name: Berries + Cottage Cheese
meals.prepInstructions: Mix berries into cottage cheese or layer them.

meals.name: Ground Beef & Zucchini Bowl
meals.prepInstructions: Slice zucchini into rounds or half-moons. Microwave with extra water, covered (4-5 min) - not too long or it gets mushy. Drain well (or keep water for drinking). Reheat beef (1-2 min). Combine in bowl with sliced avocado. Drizzle EVOO, squeeze lemon, salt/pepper. Optional: Add Tajin and drink the veggie broth.

meals.name: Herbal tea + almonds
meals.prepInstructions: Brew tea, serve with almonds.

meals.name: Rotisserie Chicken & Veggie Bowl
meals.prepInstructions: Pull/shred white meat from rotisserie chicken. Steam frozen broccoli in microwave with extra water (4-5 min). Combine in bowl with sliced avocado. Drizzle EVOO, squeeze lemon, salt/pepper. Optional: Add Tajin and drink the veggie broth.

meals.name: Greek Yogurt Bowl
ingredients: 3/4 cup (about 170g) plain Greek yogurt (2%) or Trimona yogurt
meals.prepInstructions: Top yogurt with berries and sprinkle cinnamon.

meals.name: Chicken "Soup" Bowl
meals.prepInstructions: Option A (Stove): Heat bone broth in pot with grated ginger + pinch turmeric. Add carrots (pre-cooked or cook in broth). Add shredded chicken, heat through. Option B (Microwave): Microwave carrots (4 min), then combine in large bowl with shredded chicken + bone broth + ginger + turmeric. Microwave 2-3 min until hot.

meals.name: Herbal tea + almonds
meals.prepInstructions: Brew tea, serve with almonds.

focus: GI Recovery: Cooked vegetables, bone broth, ACV if tolerated
High Protein: 100-120g/day for satiety and muscle preservation
Stress Management: Keep meals simple - don't add cooking stress
Hydration: Continue water and Optima electrolytes
weekNotes.cookingSchedule: 2 main cooking days: Saturday (optional oven for Brussels), Sunday (chili + salmon). All other days: Microwave + simple assembly
